posts.post_content:
Please PM or email [url]msbsportscards@gmail.com[/url] to confirm. Prices include insurance.  Check preferred, paypal accepted.

Lajoie.  A few small horizontal creases.  Smudge on top.  $145

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/myachelydra/forsaleiii/websize/msb%20t206%20lajoie.jpg[/IMG]

Jennings.  No creases.  Solid card.  $120

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/myachelydra/forsaleiii/MSB%20t206%20Jennings%20hand.jpg[/IMG]

Bresnahan.  Horizontal crease, spot of paper loss below belt, writing reverse.  $38

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersko/myachelydra/forsaleiii/msb%20t206%20bresnahan.jpg[/IMG]
